com.superduckinvaders.game.objective

Class Objective

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.objective.Objective
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollectObjective, KillObjective, SurviveObjective

    public abstract class Objective
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an objective that needs to be completed in order to advance.
